title: Caiairossa
text: Riparbella is the cradle of Caiarossa; a small medieval village that stands on a hill on the Tuscan coast.

title: PISA
text: Between one wine tasting and another, don't miss the chance to take a picture holding up the famous leaning tower of Pisa.

title: FLORENCE
text: Not far from Florence, Caiarossa embraces all the influence of the cradle of the Renaissance.
